CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "No_Renovation"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "LOC") ), "Bridge", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Term"), "Term", IF( OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Bridge_Renovation"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Ground_Up_Construction")), "Renovation", "" )
) )
CustomField.label: RecordType
